alert.note: Alert for Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 1:56PM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and north central, northeast, northwest and west central Missouri. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM Thursday to noon CST Saturday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late Wednesday night through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
